languages.text: This flame deals {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, decreasing the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1 and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −10% for each stack.
languages.original_text: Пламя наносит противнику {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g}, уменьшая его {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} на 1 и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} на 10% за каждый уровень эффекта.

traits.locale_text: This flame deals warp damage, decreasing the enemy's deflection by −1 and armour by −10% for each stack.

languages.text: Estas llamas infligen {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g}, lo que reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} del enemigo en −1 y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} en un −10 % por cada acumulación.
languages.original_text: This flame deals {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, decreasing the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1 and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −10% for each stack.

traits.locale_text: Estas llamas infligen {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g}, lo que reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} del enemigo en −1 y su {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} en un −10 % por cada acumulación.

languages.text: 火焰会造成{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}，每层效果使敌人{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}降低1点，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低10%。
languages.original_text: This flame deals {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, decreasing the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1 and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −10% for each stack.

traits.locale_text: 火焰会造成{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}，每层效果使敌人{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}降低1点，{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}降低10%。

languages.text: Diese Flamme verursacht {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} und reduziert die {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} des Feindes pro Stapel um −1 und die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} um −10 %.
languages.original_text: This flame deals {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, decreasing the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1 and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −10% for each stack.

traits.locale_text: Diese Flamme fügt {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} zu und reduziert die {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} des Feindes pro Stapel um −1, die {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} um −10 %.

languages.text: Cette flamme inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g}, réduisant la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de l'ennemi de −1 et son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de −10 % par cumul.

traits.locale_text: Cette flamme inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts warp{/g}, réduisant la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de l'ennemi de -1 et son {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de -10 % par cumul.
